General.Name: Richy Place 2002 Public Company Limited
General.Description: Richy Place 2002 Public Company Limited engages in the real estate development business in Thailand. It develops and sells houses, condominiums, and other properties. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
